mapper.sql: id, yuanqu, dept_new, project_name, project_level, project_type, project_lb, isxzyljs, applydat, user_account_name, user_account, yggh, sex_name, birthday, userdept, edu, zhicheng, zhichenglc, zhiwu, zhuany, zhuanc, telephone, lev, typ, projectcontent, lincaqfx, lincyyfx, lincjssb, syz, jjz, czgz, srtdat, enddat, yanzhan_date, zq_date, mq_date, archive_id, file_id, file_url, ycdat, shstate, xmjdstate, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, projectmdyycx, gnwyjyygk, kxxfxssjh, projectlcwtxyfx, ryjjpxgwzzqk, blhgbfzffcs, zkcs, sfwyzlkmfw, flownum
mapper.select:
SELECT xxb_b_check.id, xxb_b_check.yuanqu, xxb_b_check.dept_new, xxb_b_check.project_name, xxb_b_check.project_level, xxb_b_check.project_type, xxb_b_check.project_lb, xxb_b_check.isxzyljs, xxb_b_check.applydat, xxb_b_check.user_account_name, xxb_b_check.user_account, xxb_b_check.yggh, xxb_b_check.zhuany, xxb_b_check.zhuanc, xxb_b_check.lev, xxb_b_check.typ, xxb_b_check.projectcontent, xxb_b_check.lincaqfx, xxb_b_check.lincyyfx, xxb_b_check.lincjssb, xxb_b_check.syz, xxb_b_check.jjz, xxb_b_check.czgz, xxb_b_check.srtdat, xxb_b_check.enddat, xxb_b_check.yanzhan_date, xxb_b_check.zq_date, xxb_b_check.mq_date, xxb_b_check.archive_id, xxb_b_check.file_id, xxb_b_check.file_url, xxb_b_check.ycdat, xxb_b_check.shstate, xxb_b_check.xmjdstate, xxb_b_check.COMMENTS, xxb_b_check.STATE, xxb_b_check.IS_DELETEMARK, xxb_b_check.MODIFY_TIME, xxb_b_check.CREATE_TIME, xxb_b_check.CREATE_USER_ID, xxb_b_check.MODIFY_USER_ID, xxb_b_check.projectmdyycx, xxb_b_check.gnwyjyygk, xxb_b_check.kxxfxssjh, xxb_b_check.projectlcwtxyfx, xxb_b_check.ryjjpxgwzzqk, xxb_b_check.blhgbfzffcs, xxb_b_check.zkcs, xxb_b_check.sfwyzlkmfw, xxb_b_check.flownum, sdl_b_user.sex_name, sdl_b_user.birthday, sdl_b_user.dept_new userdept, sdl_b_user.edu, sdl_b_user.zhicheng, sdl_b_user.zyjsgw_lc zhichenglc, sdl_b_user.renshizifw zhiwu, sdl_b_user.telephone
FROM xxb_b_check inner join sdl_b_user on xxb_b_check.user_account=sdl_b_user.user_account
union all SELECT mdl_d_mdt_old.id, '' yuanqu, sdl_b_user.dept_new, mdl_d_mdt_old.xmmc as project_name, '' project_level, '' project_type, '' project_lb, '' isxzyljs, '' applydat, sdl_b_user.user_account_name, sdl_b_user.user_account, sdl_b_user.yggh, '' zhuany, '' zhuanc, '' lev, '' typ, '' projectcontent, '' lincaqfx, '' lincyyfx, '' lincjssb, '' syz, '' jjz, '' czgz, '' srtdat, '' enddat, '' yanzhan_date, '' zq_date, '' mq_date, '' archive_id, '' file_id, '' file_url, '' ycdat, '' shstate, '' xmjdstate, '' COMMENTS, '' STATE, '' IS_DELETEMARK, '' MODIFY_TIME, '' CREATE_TIME, '' CREATE_USER_ID, '' MODIFY_USER_ID, '' projectmdyycx, '' gnwyjyygk, '' kxxfxssjh, '' projectlcwtxyfx, '' ryjjpxgwzzqk, '' blhgbfzffcs, '' zkcs, '' sfwyzlkmfw, '' flownum, sdl_b_user.sex_name, sdl_b_user.birthday, sdl_b_user.dept_new userdept, sdl_b_user.edu, sdl_b_user.zhicheng, sdl_b_user.zyjsgw_lc zhichenglc, sdl_b_user.renshizifw zhiwu, sdl_b_user.telephone
FROM mdl_d_mdt_old inner join sdl_b_user on mdl_d_mdt_old.user_account=sdl_b_user.user_account
